snippet: Mr. Puccio won fame prosecuting congressmen in the 1980s Abscam scandals, then switched sides and defended Claus von Bülow, corrupt politicians and other notorious clients.
abstract: Thomas P Puccio, New York lawyer who won fame prosecuting congressmen in the 1980s Abscam scandals, then switched sides and defended Claus von Bulow, corrupt politicians and other notorious clients, dies at age 67.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Puccio won fame prosecuting congressmen in the 1980s Abscam scandals, then switched sides and defended Claus von Bülow, corrupt politicians and other notorious clients.

headline.seo: Thomas Puccio, Lawyer Who Had Notorious Clients, Dies at 67
headline.main: Thomas Puccio, Ex-Prosecutor and Lawyer for Notorious Clients, Dies at 67
headline.print_headline: Thomas Puccio, 67, Lawyer With Infamous Clients, Dies
